column1: The '''Scroll of Kings''' was a list of all the [[King of Númenor|Rulers]] of [[Númenor]]. These names were written in [[Quenya]]
column2: the tongue of the [[High Elves]] of [[Aman|the West]]. Even after the Kings of Númenor began to hate the Elves
column3: they still used Quenya when they wrote their names into the Scroll
column4: because they feared to break this tradition. For example
column6: the first King to take an [[Adûnaic]] royal name
column7: had the Quenya translation [[Tar-Herunúmen]] written into the Scroll.<ref>{{S|Akallabeth}}</ref> The original Scroll of Kings was probably destroyed in the [[Downfall of Númenor]]
column8: but copies of the same information
column9: such as the ''[[Line of Elros (document)|Line of Elros]]''
column10: survived the disaster and were later preserved in [[Gondor]].
